items.sentence: Tom was asked to be best man at Mary\'s brother\'s wedding.
Tom certainly didn\'t have my permission to do what he did.
I thought you were going to keep Tom here until I got back.
I want to arrive at Kennedy Airport early in the afternoon.
I want to find out what Mary is going to wear to the dance.
Tom is exactly the sort of guy Mary wants to hang out with.
Tom is now in the hospital recovering from a gunshot wound.
Tom is one of the most respected men in the business world.
Tom used to eat out every day, but now he can\'t afford to.
I missed the last train, so I had to walk all the way home.
